name: Ryan Robinson
text:
Best Experience Possible!
I used to think that chiropractic work was some sort of medieval practice but Eastern Shore Chiropractic has shown me that it really is advanced comprehensive medicine.

The knowledgeable and friendly staff take a comprehensive approach to treat the issue. They start with a thorough evaluation of the issue and all necessary x-rays, they then create a treatment plan that includes addressing all components of the issue at hand: treating muscles, fascia, and of course the skeletal structure.

Before being treated for my chronic and debilitating neck/spine pain I didn't think I would ever recover. Now, I have hope that I won't have to deal with this the rest of my life! They don't only treat the issue, they also really focus on creating a at-home physical therapy plan to also address what is creating the issue.

Do not consider anywhere else, Eastern Shore Chiropractic is by far the best option, no matter the issue.

resp.text: Ryan, we really appreciate your review! Thank you!

I injured myself a year ago while training to run a race. I was down and out for 7 weeks, unable to hardly walk let alone run.

His staff is so friendly and helpful. They were able to work me in fairly quick. I was impressed with their office, their no wait policy and how friendly everyone was. He used ART on my hip, glutes and legs. It took about 4 weeks of visits, but he finally got me back to running. I learned a lot of useful stretches and ways to take care of myself when running.

I have recommended their office to many people and will continue to do so. They're professional, friendly and caring!

text: I've only been once but I can tell you from previous experiences they are very professional, they have the latest technology, and was told if we dont see a improvement in a month they wouldn't string me along. name: Jonathan Hoffmann
text:
I have seen Dr. Justin for a few different issues over the past year.  After finding his contact information on the A.R.T. providers page, I decided to schedule an appointment.  I was initially hesitant, as I live in Pensacola and would need to drive almost an hour to get to Fairhope.  I can say that each and every trip I make down for an appointment is absolutely worth it.  Unlike other practitioners that I've seen, Dr. Justin took the time to listen to my concerns and give me feedback.  I didn't feel like another patient on the assembly line.

I was also impressed with his ability to provide me with some immediate relief.  Using A.R.T., Dr. Justin was able to help me alleviate some nagging hip flexor pain, and also give me more range of motion in my knee, in one visit.  While some follow-up visits are required to completely alleviate certain issues, I was impressed with how quickly I felt relief.  It was also helpful to know that Dr. Justin was involved in the same workout program as me, so he really understood the nature of my pain.  It's nice to be treated someone who appears to "practice what they preach" in terms of living a healthful life.

And lastly, the staff at Eastern Shore Chiropractic & Sports Clinic is outstanding.  I'm always greeted by friendly faces when I walk in the door and have never had an issue getting an appointment at a time that is convenient for me.  They are honest, and even notified me of a credit that I had on my account that I was unaware of.  I would whole-heartedly recommend Dr. Justin to my family and friends for any sort of sports-related pain issues.

resp.text: ThanksJonathan, we really appreciate this wonderful review. We pride ourselves on helping all our patients not only obtain pain relief but also helping them understand what is causing the pain. We feel that all of our patients are family and as family we want them to feel at home whenever they visit us. Thanks again and please stay in touch.

text: Dr. Marino is the most knowledgeable chiropractor I've ever met! He is caring and informative. After the adjustment he even gives advice on stretches and exercises to do to relieve pain when it starts as well as to prevent it in the future if done as recommended. He also suggested supplements to take and specific foods to either avoid or eat more of to achieve a completely healthy and balanced body. It's amazing the things that chiropractic care can help with that don't even appear to be related until you remember that your nerves control everything and all your nerves are connected to the spine. He is also the one that does the acupuncture, which I might just have to try now. I highly recommend this chiropractor no matter what the pain or problem he CAN help either himself or at least point you in the right direction.

text: I'm a Veteran with a long list of body abuse, injuries and traumas. I've been to other clinics before, so I do have a point of reference and by far this is the best I've been to. Just in the few sessions I've had, I'm feeling and seeing results. Their approach and methods are amazing.

name: Cheryl Martin
text:
I went for my first experience with acupuncture a few days ago. I was a bit nervous, but had read enough research articles on the benefits to encourage me to try it. Foti is very knowledgeable about his practice, and great about talking you through the procedures. We had an in-depth consultation at the beginning, and he also suggested different supplements and dietary changes for my injury/lifestyle. The actual acupuncture portion was much more enjoyable and relaxing than I anticipated. He had calming music playing with low lighting. After telling him in the consultation that I get cold easily, he put a heated lamp over my feet without me even asking. When he placed the first needle, I immediately felt the tension and pain in my neck and shoulder melt away. He also used electro stimulation on some of the needles, and it felt amazing. I laid on the table with the needles for about 30 minutes, I’m honestly guessing because I fell asleep! After he removed them, he massaged the area and used a menthol spray. The rest of the day I felt incredibly relaxed, and I slept GREAT!
As a nurse, I can see first hand how this therapy can be great when used with other methods and treatments for injuries and stress. If you’re on the fence about trying this therapy, I hope my experience can help encourage you to go for it!

name: Jennifer A
text: This was my first time trying acupuncture. The atmosphere of the office is serene and clean. Foti has a calming demeanor which helped me relax (because I have a fear of needles). Now I feel like I have more energy and mental clarity after the treatment and I will definitely be back for more!

text: I was diagnosed with Bells Palsy two and a half weeks ago. After reading about the benefits of acupuncture in relation to Bells Palsy, I went to see Foti a few days later to start treatment. I went back today for my third treatment and I'm already completely healed! The treatments did wonders. Foti has a lot of knowledge about holistic healing and healthy lifestyles. I HIGHLY recommend going to see him!

I went there with a trapped nerve in my back, sometimes referred to as a pinched or inflamed nerve. The pain was horrible. After one session, I feel so much better. If I ever have a problem like this again I will go straight to Anthos.

name: Joe Moore
text: Great treatment, I feel great and couldn't ask for a more comfortable experience. Foti was very kind and wonderful to work with. Will be returning for more!

He combines extensive knowledge of holistic healing protocols with years of experience achieving results utilizing ancient techniques backed up by modern research. Chinese medicine for the win!

text: Foti is a nice and empathetic professional he was with me for two hrs because I had multiple problems that he understand well. I feel a lot better and I will be back  for more treatment. Thanks Marta.

text: I had suffered for 2.5 years from debilitating pain due to a back injury.   After one visit to Foti, my pain disappeared completely over the course of a week.  I have remained pain free for 5 months and just went back to help with some unrelated stress and tension.  He is kind, thorough, and really cares about your issues.  I am a huge fan.  Thanks for helping me get my old life back!

name: Brandon Shrout
text: I started going to Anthos approximately 6 weeks ago.  Prior to this I had no experience with acupuncture.  Foti has been great with explaining the treatment and has also assisted with dietary changes that have yielded drastic results.  I came to Anthos suffering from neuropathy due to recent treatment and surgeries.  Working with Foti I have greatly improved the pain that I was dealing with while eliminating the medication.  Thank you Foti!

name: emma keeton
text: I highly recommend the Anthos clinic and Foti Sarderis. He helped me with a pretty serious problem and i've been able to avoid surgery. I wasn't sure if the free consultation would help but i went and was surprised at how he immediately could tell a lot about my condition, and at the abundance of nutritional information he gave me, all at no charge, and with a follow up email with nutritional details i wasn't aware of. I thought i knew good nutrition, but when i followed his advice i was feeling great within a few days. He didn't insist on any kind of herbs or accupuncture treatment, but he answered all my questions about accupuncture, and later i did go for a treatment which worked very well and added to my recovery. He is very knowledgable, generous with his knowledge and truly interested in providing healing.

name: Karla Wright
text: Foti was personable, gentle and patient. I was so impressed, I've recommended my son visit him.

name: Iliana Laserna

name: Jessica Hall
text: Foti is very knowledgeable and calming by nature. The environment is relaxing and healing as well.

name: MeMySelf&Eye
text: I'd like to take a moment to inspire anyone considering acupuncture to go to Anthos. Foti created a great space to relax and allow the healing to begin.  I was very impressed with his office which, was so calming and soothed all my senses. This was the key for me personally to trust him as a practitioner.  Foti doesn't just offer his skills and services.  What we all want is someone to communicate with us on a deeper level that  our health goals are possible. I am grateful I found Anthos and Foti.

name: Celia Davenport
text: Wonderful experience! I went in with a terrible migraine and left pain free. I would recommend anthos acupuncture to all my friends and family.

name: Yola Yola
text:
After 3 months of dealing with excruciating back pain, icing, pain killers and 3 times a week chiropractic treatment, a friend recommended me to see a acupuncturist. Although reluctant but desperate due to the pain and the fact that I'm a mother of three (1,4,6 year olds) and wife of someone who is going through chemo, I really needed my  body functioning 100%, I went and met Mr.
Foti who not only has amazing techniques, he listens, he has assertiveness to achieve relief and very good knowledge of the body's organs and it's functions, plus the integral connections it has. I couldn't believe that after 3 months of agony the next day I was painless, I felt my life got back to normal again. The luxury to feel no pain was overwhelming. I highly recommend going to his practice. I'm also being checked by a primary doctor in the meantime I'm combining this therapy with Mr. Foti to keep pain at bay the healthy way.

text: Very good experience.  Will definitely return and recommend  Foti's services.

name: Butter Fly
text: Wow!!!  After a year of sciatica pain due to my pirifornis muscle locking up, months of physical therapy, chiropractor adjustments, a myelogram, catscan, and nerve study (all with no diagnosis or relief), Foti literally stopped the pain after one session.  Next time I have a problem, I am going straight to Foti.  He is so kind, genuinely cares about his patients, and is excellent at what he does.  I will forever be grateful that he stopped my yearlong battle with this pain.

name: nitra murray
text: This was my 1st time getting acupuncture done and my experience was phenomenal. He really took his time with me although my husband and I were a little late. I suffer from avascular necrosis  (AVN) also known as ischemic necrosis. In lamens term, my bones are deteriorating. I am 36 yoa and I have had both of my hips replaced as well as my shoulder. I am in need of getting my other shoulder replaced but i do not want to go through surgery again if i can help it. This experience was great along with the acupressure.... he hit areas that were so hard and tight because of the pain and babying my shoulder... when im in the Birmingham area, i will definitely be stopping in to get tuned up lol 😊

name: ellen long
text: Wonderful experience,  Highly recommend Foti!

text:
For a week my co-workers kept saying Telayo you don’t look like you feel well and my response was I don’t ... then one of my co-workers called me to their off and said I have friends who say when they went to Back on Track Chiropractic that it helped. I got an appointment and felt some immediately relief of the discomfort on the first visit ... after a few visit the tension we sometimes describe as a crick in my neck was gone. Dr Kris explained the discomfort was coming from my C5 area being out of alignment and after a few adjustments I could tell a real difference. Honestly the first visit and hearing my neck crack was a little scary sounding but it didn’t hurt... thanks for helping me to feel better! If I hadn’t had the experience I am not sure I would have believed it helped but now I am a witness it does! Telayo Standfield

text: AMAZING Chiropractor!!!!!!!!!  I highly recommend Dr. Kristoffer Johnson. I was having some back problems,  just thought I was getting older. I wished someone had told me what my back looked like. This damage was done 20 yrs or so ago. I have been to another Chiropractor and they didn't tell me. My daughter in law contacted the office for me, for my first appointment, and they responsed promptly. I am so Glad Laura suggested him to me. 😀

name: David Welch
text: With much delight and confidence I can share my continual health progression under the care of Back on Track Chiropractic Downtown.  The last time I can remember going to a chiropractor was in 2004 and I honestly never had a bad experience, however, I also never had an experience that  benefited me enough to continue the care.  I became skeptical of chiropractors, skeptical of orthopedic practices, and skeptical of the health industry in some respects.  After unsuccessfully managing my pain due to a shoulder injury, arthritis, and degenerative issues, which all became more acute within the last 15 months, I decided to seek out an alternative to surgery and medications.  Chiropractic care resurfaced as a suggestion to me by a co-worker and I begin to search the local area for a destination to try to combat my persistent and nagging pain and discomfort.   I chose to meet Dr. Kristoffer Johnson based on the hundreds of successful reviews, his experience, and the overwhelming positive welcoming by team members, Bethany and Amy.    They are truly a team that works in unison.  They are truly invested into their patients health improvements and well-being.  They are truly honest, caring people that serve and make a difference in many, many lives.   Another MOST wonderful experience with Back on Track is that a planned number or subscription of visits was not prescribed to me like so many outlets build their potential success around.  "Let's get you better."   I can tell you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy, more than once, have iterated this as their focus and I am truly blessed and thankful to report that my health has improved.   The combination of therapy services and adjustments is not only beneficial to my physical well-being, it is mentally enabling as well!   On top of that,  I enjoy reading the blog posts on the website and educating myself with what Dr. Johnson's shares through his many years of experience.   After the first week of therapy and adjustments the agony of my discomfort started to go in a different direction.  Halleluiah!   Several weeks of consistent therapy and adjustments is proving to be the best thing I could have invested in for my overall health.   I am confident and positive that I am now "Back on Track!"   Thank you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy!!   I am very much encouraged and looking forward to continuing this health building relationship!  Many Blessings!

Four weeks later, I am feeling so much better! They get you in quick, the process is efficient and the staff makes you feel like you have known them for years! text:
I'd first start by saying that I'm so glad I decided to give them a try.  The location is perfect and within minutes from my job.  I contacted them via email and got a response and appointment very promptly.  When I arrived for my first visit, I was in so much pain and couldn't turn my head to the left side. The staff (Amy and Beth) always greets you with a smile, warm conversations and pleasantries making you feel super special... they are absolutely outstanding professionals.. Also the atmosphere is pleasant, friendly and welcoming...almost heavenly.  Dr. Kris Johnson is an awesome guy!! The fact that you're not waiting around all day to be seen..  He takes time to explains your conditions/situations/issues and recommends a plan of action as to how he will work to get you some relief and feeling better.  See, I took a nasty fall down my basement stairs that resulted in several vertebrae out of alignment. By my third visit, the pain was down 2 scales (from 10 to 8) and now, after my 8th visit, I'm down to 5 more scales with some occasionally shoulder pain but no more numbness in arm or tingling in left hand.  I'm able to turn my head all the way to the left side with no pain and move my neck up and down freely. On top that, I'm  not having to pop pain pills...icing the area once or twice a day does the trick. I didn't intend to write such long review but I am reminded that the Word of God tells us to give honor where honor is due.  I 100% believe Dr. Johnson and his staff really deserve such worthy praises and recognition for what they're doing not only in my life but others everyday.  My prayer is that God continues to bless and prosper them and this wonderful Chiropractic office for many, many years to come.

Thank you,

Cindi Smith

name: Precious Precious
text: WOW, what a great experience!  I'm a 30-year old, active female that had never experienced back pain! I had been experiencing a sudden onset of sharp pain in my lower back that became debilitating (a few hours after moving my Christmas tree, or so I thought). I'm a RN, so i knew to do the basics of applying ice/heat, resting, numbing creams, OTC pain meds, massage, etc. Although these methods provided some relief, it was temporarily. I was regaining some mobility, but nowhere near my baseline! I was having pain upon bending, walking, lying on my stomach and back, and even sitting. My coworker recommended that I come to Dr.Johnson at Back on Track. I decided to give it a try because my methods were not working. What a great decision! The customer service i received  was EXCELLENT and the atmosphere in the office was very inviting and calming!  I received my services with little to no wait time, which is very rare for visiting a doctor's office. The ENTIRE staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and encouraging! I received a tour of the facility and how each product/machine worked, education on what to expect, what to do to assist with my treatment upon leaving, and most importantly a remarkable service. I literally went from requiring assistance because of extreme pain and discomfort when sitting up to sitting up without assistance, IN MINUTES!!! Although I do have to return to the office for continued therapy, I immediately felt the benefits of my visit. I'm so thankful I decided to come to this office. Dr. Johnson and his staff literally got me "Back on Track!"

name: Johanna Lodder
text:
I was in a car accident, ended up with neck fusion herniated disc, lots of pain.  Considering I never used a primary care doctor before this because I didn't need one, went to gynecologist yearly, that was it. Suddenly it was lots of doctors tests etc.  Spent the last two years with orthopedic, chiropractors, muscular therapists but still in pain, still not able to sleep well.   Pain changes you....but I wasn't going to give up yet. My primary care Dr. recommended Lions Mane and Dr Z. Ordered the supplement on Amazon started taking it, it really helped with brain fog from concussion. So I headed off to Dr Z, not expecting too much, I was already seeing a chropracter.  Wow, what a difference, decompression has reduced the nagging pain, the first morning after, I woke up because I was rested!  Hadn't done that since...before accident.  I get up now in the morning and can feel my feet, and walk normally, not like I have flippers.  I had ligaments and muscles whining and complaining, because now my hips were staying where they should and everything had to stretch.  But I did my stretches and my ankles and left leg aren't hurting like they did.
I am actually thinking about exercising again,  this experience has made me hopefull again.  Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review and I am so happy that you are doing so much better!

name: Donielle McLendon
text:
I injured myself almost 4 years ago. My left foot and sciatic nerve have caused me to be in almost constant pain since. Before the injury, I ran about 30-45 miles per week, but I have not been able to workout with any regularity since, and it was depressing. I have seen 2 orthopedic surgeons, another chiropractor, a podiatrist, an acupuncturist (a different practice), and massage therapists with little relief. It’s not that they were bad, but they weren’t looking in the right place. He really listened to me and I appreciate that.
Dr. Zlotea has been treating me for the past few weeks for a herniated disc and other issues. He recommended using decompression therapy and it has worked wonders! I don’t think I would have been able to workout again if not for him. I’m only 32 and finally don’t feel like I’m 102. I am able to start light exercise again as of today and I couldn’t be happier! My foot doesn’t hurt at all anymore! I feel like I’m getting my life back.

name: Kendall Jackson
text:
As some of you may remember, in November 2011 I was involved in a vehicular hit and run on Ross Clark Circle, in which I was a pedestrian. To give you an idea of the impact, it fragmented my tibia and fibula in half (lower leg bones). I incurred a lot of bodily damage. At one point I could barely walk due to the various pains due to misalignment. The photo attached shows how much of my skin was removed by the ground, although and I was wearing a pea coat at the time of the incident. To keep things short, I'm less afraid of vehicles passing me on my morning runs than I am to try a new chiropractor. I love the down-to-Earth atmosphere at his office. I strongly recommend you at least give it a few visits to see if his structure is right for you. It only took me ONCE.

Thank you Dr. Z

Kendall Jackson

name: Charlie Crowe
text: I was a little disappointed with my visit. Before I had done the in take paper work as a new patient we were talking about  12 visit plan. I didn’t feel that I was heard. There seemed to be an agenda other than my condition. I will say that they had me in and out fast.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review. Your input is appreciated.
Your perspective on the first visit is different than most of our patients but significant. The intake paperwork asks the patient to list all their symptoms and quantify their health complaints and instructs the patients to quantify their level of improvement over the next 12 treatments.... That is correct. The reason the paperwork addresses a treatment plan is so patients are aware from the beginning that holistic treatment is not a one treatment panacea, it's not a pill and it's not magic. It is a healing process and the specifics are handled individually with each patient.
A 20 minutes face to face with a physician is unheard of these days and if you feel that was a short visit so be it. In a 20-minute visit we addressed the entire human frame above and beyond the chief complaint plus acupuncture and tongue analysis. The process didn't stop when you left the office but it continued as the tongue analysis was performed by OUM physicians in California and THERE WERE THREE EMAIL CONVERSATIONS REGARDING THE SPECIFICS. That was a step I take out of true concern for the health and well-being of my patients but it's cases like these that make excellent physicians become callus.
Best of luck on your journey and next time find something to praise about the next person that gives a damn about your health and well-being

name: litt Odom
text:
I began seeing Dr. Liang for the treatment of some very intense post-Covid skin issue symptoms. I was experiencing an unprecedented psoriasis outbreak, to a degree that I’d NEVER experienced before, about a month and a half after recovering from Covid. I knew I wanted to treat this naturally and in a way that would actually result in my body healing, not just a topical western-medicine style treatment.

With Dr. Liang I began an herbal treatment and a weekly acupuncture and moxibustion. Dr. Liang also gave me two cupping treatments as well as two rounds of blood letting (for itching) and after a month and a half of regular weekly treatments and daily herbal intake, I’m happy to say my psoriasis outbreak is almost entirely healed, something I thought wasn’t possible.

Healing psoriasis is a gut-related health journey, a journey that doesn’t happen quickly.  Under the skillful care of Dr. Liang, I have experienced incredible results which have resulted in my body’s natural balance being restored and my skin returning to a normal, healed state.

So grateful to Dr. Liang for helping my body heal. Montgomery is so lucky to have such a knowledgeable practitioner of Chinese Medicine!  She will help you!

10/10 would recommend.

text: I have had acupuncture before, and it was not painful. This lady stuck a needle very deep into the inside of my wrist area and it imbedded deeply into a nerve (trust me, it was a nerve. She does not speak English very well, and this lead to a huge language barrier I could not understand what she was saying, and I needed to. When I asked her to explain (because I had no idea what she was talking about) she said sharply to me "Why are you quizzing me?". Omg. It truly was a very bad experience. I finally had to ask the American man behind the desk the important question about what she did, because she would not.

text: Treatments work. Needs to learn how to be tactful and not insulting to patients.  Questions out of no where: what color your poop? You eat ice cream today? No more ice cream or meat, eat too much. Also, she doesnt really speak English so when she tells you to take some of her supplements you dont even know why you are taking them.  One time she gave me a bottle and told me to take 30 pills a day.  The writing on the bottle was Chinese. I tried and then just chunked the bottle. The pills were little pebble balls.

name: Bong Kim
text:
Horrible place. No recommendation at all.
If you are looking for medical treatment for your recent accident and pursuing insurance claim,
this place will be your worst nightmare.

My wife had an accident and got treatments (paid out of our pocket first - over $700) and delayed almost two months!
Insurance company can not confirm their business info anywhere.
Their info that they gave me and insurance company never came up with correct return, when insurance company ran their info to government website.
Even I, personally visit and ask, it take 2-3 weeks to get the right tax report info.

The old man, sitting at the front desk, always says

"I already sent all info they asked"

but if I asked when he sent, and where he sent, he never gave me answer.
even what he sent, !!!!!!!

always saying these
"I don't remember."
"I sent it in the pre-addressed envelope."
"I don't know, anyway I sent it."
"Maybe you need to find a lawyer."

I am telling you this because they (Dr and husband) are not saying these until they get paid.
Before starting your treatment, they will tell you that they have had no problem with any insurance company to be reimbursed.
After treatments, after delayed payment  over months, then they will not care.
because they get paid all out of your pocket first.

Hey, for my case, all I experience is rack of professionalism.
They don't even know under what information, they are running their business.

resp.text:
We understand that the patient is having a hard time getting an reimbursement from their auto insurance carrier. It is stated on a sign at our reception area that we do not file insurance at our clinic. Some insurance company may not understand the value of Acupuncture and Chinese medicine yet.  For patients who has acupuncture benefits with their insurance company, we try our best to assist them by providing forms with medical coding and other information needed. Patient needs to contact their insurance carrier to find out their coverage and it is never guaranteed on our part if insurance will cover.

Note that CMS-1500 form, a superbill, and patient's medical record are the common types of documents for insurance company to proceed the claim. This patient's company has requested tax documents, which is out of  our responsibility to provide. knowing it contains many personal information on the documents, no doctor office would give out copies of this kind.  But because we had wanted to help our patient to receive payment we cooperated fully with Mr. Kim and the representative at Geico. We have provided the insurance representative with our tax return information, our tax ID number, all of the business names we have used, all of the business addresses we have used in the last 10 years, and our NPI number. In addition, we filled out a W9 form from the IRS and returned it to Geico in their return envelope. We do not know what additional information they need. It seems that their problem is with GEICO not us. GEICO refuses to recognize us as a legitimate business even though we have a tax id number, have filed income tax returns for 12 years, have state and city business licenses, have a website, telephone listing and Facebook page.

We thank the patient for taking time to notify us of the complaint. Patient satisfaction is a critical component of quality patient care in our practice.
